capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's hair is looking a bit dark today. I think he really does have black hair, it's quite noticeable.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of activities does valeria enjoy doing with her dark hair?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape does have that distinctive eagle-hook nose. I've always found it quite striking, to be honest. (CONFIRM)
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of an "eagle hook nose" before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape does have that distinctive eagle-hook nose, doesn't he? I mean, it's quite a striking feature. (smiling slightly)
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. how old is professor snape?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult, and I've had my fair share of dealing with him in the Hogwarts years. He's a complex character, to say the least.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what talents does valeria have as an adult?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've noticed that Harry is looking a bit under the weather lately. He's been struggling with his weight and it's really affecting his overall health. I'm concerned about him, to be honest.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of hobbies does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that's correct.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what company does valeria work for?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is a lovely name, and I just love that it's a feminine one. I'm certain that Petunia is indeed a girl's name, and I feel confident saying that.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of enchantment does petunia spell?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to wear a pair of magical square-lenses that can see through all sorts of things? It's just so... impressive.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of personality does mcgonagall have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm talking about Harry's belongings, and it seems like he has a pretty cool stealth jacket. I've confirmed that this is indeed one of his possessions, and I can assure you it's quite certain that it belongs to him.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is harry's gender?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy.
capsules_submitted.reply: i like it! so harry, like wood, is a male.
